execution_plan.description: Compute the mean (average) product price across all products.
execution_plan.query: SELECT AVG(product_price) AS mean_price FROM Products;

execution_plan.description: Select product prices and sizes for products whose price is greater than the mean computed in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_size FROM Products WHERE product_price > $step1.mean_price;
